column4: My Internet connection is sooo slow and I can't figure out why. Someone tell me what's wrong!
-> did you pay for high speed access or low speed access?
No, it's broadband. It should be decently fast but it's not. The thing is that I'm in college and it's fine on my roommate's laptop, but not on mine.
-> you been messing with your roomates gf, he put a hex on you..lol
-> well what do you consider slow?
-> what if the remote end dishing out towards you is slow? you can not do much about that..
But if what you are describing is true, wouldn't it be slow for my roommate as well?
-> is it same site? so having multiple access to that remote site maybe putting on a priority basis ?
Is what the same site? I ran speed tests in the same room.
-> its also possible your school is putting a cap on your accesses?
Nah. I've been using it for about 2 & 1/2 years now. This is something else.
It's just as slow on Windows as it is on Linux, for the record.
Is that an IRC thing? I'm not sure what nameserver means.
-> nameservers is essential to your enjoyment of the internet
-> kindly google for that word, nameserver and get some explanation
So can you tell me how to check if my nameserver is functioning?
